name: Soul Sanity
description:
Go through the game with your sanity in the line!

 Soul Sanity is a Souls-like game that challenges your movement to avoid obstacles and reach each checkpoint.

Fight through monsters and bosses of each region jumping in their heads and nothing more! see if your sanity stays. :)

[A] / [D] to move right or left.

[W] /  [S] To go up or down the Vines.

[TAB] to see pieces of information.

[ESC] to access the main menu or pause.

[Scroll Wheel] to Zoom in or Out

[E] to interact with Items or Actions

Current Version [12.7.22.8 Demo]

If anyone is interested in working on this project direct message Kishimai#3421 for more information (Composer, Artist)
